page.title: 19LIFE STYLES
page.content: {Industry}- Dursley will have a factory to produce babies from frozen embryos. More people will be self-employed in Dursley because Listers will be completely computerised. Manpower will be replaced by robots. {Buildings}will be made of aluminium bricks. Dursley would have two main areas. The inner area would contain houses, shops and roads. The outer area would control the nuclear waste by means of a lazer shield. Shops will be advertising travel to the moon and holidays in space. {Food}- Everyone will be vegetarians because there will be a scarcity of animals. Three course meals will come prepared in special packs.
